sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_176383_star_wars_gear"> <x_176383_star_wars_gear action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <base_damage>0</base_damage> <critical_rating/> <defense/> <description>Little more than a pair of folding or collapsible legs mounted beneath the barrel of a long arm, bipods are used to stabilize awkward or heavy weapons to improve their firing characteristics. Especially useful when firing from behind low cover or from a prone position, bipods are typically used on squad support weapons, or by sharpshooters and snipers to better steady their weapons. This attachment can only be applied to rifles, carbines, and light repeating blasters, and takes one preparation maneuver to set up. Models Include: Galactic Arms XA Classic Bipod, Czerka AA20 Marksman Bipod. Base Modifiers: Decrease weapon's Cumbersome rating by 2 when firing from a prone or crouched position (or can otherwise brace the bipod on something). Modification Options: None.</description> <encumbrance/> <hard_points/> <hp_required>1</hp_required> <name>Bipod Mount</name> <number>GEAR0001142</number> <price>100</price> <range/> <rarity>1</rarity> <skill_used/> <soak/> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2020-11-18 19:24:25</sys_created_on> <sys_id>51fb753d2face890e0f497eef699b6c0</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2020-11-18 19:24:25</sys_updated_on> <type>mod</type> </x_176383_star_wars_gear> </record_update>
